contact.title: CONTACT US!
contact.description: Send us an email using this handy form. We look forward to hearing from you!

form.how: How did you hear about us?
form.privacy_policy: I am informed about the privacy policies of this site and approve their content.
form.newsletter: I give my permission to KEI to send relevant information, whether in the form of newsletters or emails.

contact.success_message: Your message has been sent. Thank you!
contact.error_message: Oops, an error occurred. Please try again
